title: Paws and Soul Free
description:

Paws and Soul is a third-person relaxing- adventure game about rebirth, where you will visit a mysterious forest as a wolf. The story about a man that youâ€™ll see with animal eyes is extended by fascinating gameplay focused on exploration and searching for collectibles. Look for clues about your past life, reveal bonus stories about other people and enjoy breathtaking views.
You are completely safe here, so relax and let your curiosity run wild! Find out how the lives of the wolf and the human are connected and reveal the secret of reincarnation . Buddhist ideas, the doctrine of rebirth and karma are the base of the game The meditative atmosphere will help you to forget about the world for couple of hours and enjoy the peace and beauty of the magical forest
